"...As we were saying, we want one of th:
"Umm...even if you ask in a sweet voice...
Oh, <%me>! Please save me!"
"1. What are you doing?"
"2. Gaining Intelligence?"
"Hah, no. This is just Patty complaining."
"I just want a cool title, such as Guardian, like you guys have!"
"Started to shout things like that..."

"An exclusive title...So cool!
Although we call ourselves \"ARKS' No. 1 Info. Dealer\", that's just self-proclaimed right?"

"Ehh...!
Patty, you knew it was self-proclaimed!?"

"That's why, just one favor!
We want authorization from ARKS, just like that!"
"Even then, those ideas are from Commander-in-chief Ulc. There's nothing else I can do."
"Speaking of which, why are there exclusive titles like that, instead of being assigned to The Council of Six?"

"Well, at first there were talks about assigning
<%me> and Matoi as new members."
"However, The Council of Six are those who prioritize their judgement as ARKS, rather than their own judgement."
"However, <%me> and Matoi aren't like that, so a decision was made."
"So that decision was that a new title was made. It does seem useless to restrain those two under the role."
"That wasn't a compliment, you know. It means we're stuck dealing with your decisions."

"Ahh, must be nice... The role of the Guardian,
right? That means you're free to do whatever, right?"
"Uhh, I think Patty's view on being free, differs from what freedom they're allowed to express."

"I want one of those too!
Not like being a member of the Combat Unit, but having an exclusive title! I want one of those! Eh, ehh, can you, can you?"
"Even if you pester me like that, what isn't possible, isn't possible."
"Dreams will always come true if you don't give up! But fine, how do you get an exclusive title?"
"Hmm, let me see... Perhaps doing something amazing like <%me> did?"
"Something amazing...? Oh I think I have something! We've assisted in providing and guiding this person great intel!"
"Don't make up lies, Big Sis!"
"...I guess if you were to obtain amazing intel that was enough to flip the entire history of ARKS upside down, I think it might be possible?"
"Oh, something amazing that nobody totally knows! Alrighty, let's go and find this information! There's gotta be something out there!"
"...Excellent, she fell for it. Hopefully at this rate, she'll take it serious this time."
"Tea! Someone else will find it before we do, let's get moving already! Hurry, hurry!"
"Sorry for the trouble we've given you. We'll be taking our leave now."

"Yes, yes Patty, what are we looking for
this time?"
"How to exterminate the Profound Darkness, once and for all! We're going to figure it out before Xiao!"
"Seriously... Well, you would get an exclusive title from that."
